----
[[include :scp-wiki:component:image-features-source |hover-enlarge=--]
|enlarge-amount=6
|speed=250
|float=false
|width=100%
|url=http://scp-sandbox-3.wdfiles.com/local--files/ananomalouswriter/SCP%205000%20Desktop%20With%20Text.jpg
|add-caption=true
|caption=SCP-5000
]]
 _
Another entry into my specialized Art Piece Wallpaper series. Thought I'd commemorate the SCP article that sparked greater interest into SCP. The article also indirectly lead me to discovering and editing for the [[[https://www.youtube.com/c/DiscoveringSCP| DSCP]]] Podcast :). In this particular entry I tried out backlighting with the ominous red glow, coinciding with that infamous message. Depicted in the image is the final climactic act of the article, decided that it is an excellent part to show the imposing stature of the Foundation.

> Read the original article for the full experience: [[footnote]]Do it now.[[/footnote]]
> SCP-5000 â€” Why?
> Written by: Tanhony
> Link: https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-5000

Animated Live Wallpaper [[[https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=H7s6WfO0jg0 | HERE]]]
